statements: UPDATE GeneticVariants SET variant_name = 'ABC', gene_name = 'Gene1' WHERE variant_id = 1;
UPDATE GeneticVariants SET phenotype = 'XZY', chromosome_number = 22 WHERE gene_name = 'Gene2';
UPDATE GeneticVariants SET phenotype = 'Type A' WHERE chromosome_number = 1 AND position >= 1000
UPDATE GeneticVariants SET gene_name = 'BRCA1', phenotype = 'Cancer' WHERE variant_id = 5
UPDATE variants SET variant_name='Variant1', gene_name='Gene1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE phenotypes SET description='Example description', phenotype_name='Phenotype1' WHERE variant_id=2;
UPDATE variants SET variant_name = 'Variant1', position = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE phenotypes SET description = 'New description', phenotype_name = 'PhenotypeA' WHERE variant_id = 4;
UPDATE variants SET chromosome = 'X', position = 100 WHERE variant_id = 1;
UPDATE phenotypes SET description = 'New description' WHERE phenotype_id = 2;
UPDATE variants SET chromosome = 'chr1', position = 1000 WHERE variant_name = 'variant1';
UPDATE variant_phenotype SET phenotype_id = 2 WHERE variant_id = 1;
UPDATE variants SET location = 'USA' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_studies SET study_name = 'COVID-19 Study', end_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE variants SET name='Variant1', allele='Allele1' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE phenotypes SET description='New Description', name='Phenotype2' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Variant SET chromosome='X', gene='ABC' WHERE variant_id = 1;
UPDATE Publication SET title='New Research Study' WHERE publication_id = 5;
UPDATE Variant SET variant_name = 'ABC', position = 100 WHERE variant_id = 1;
UPDATE Phenotype SET phenotype_name = 'X', description = 'New Description' WHERE phenotype_id = 2;
